name: GooglePlayRolloutUpdate
description: Increase the rollout fraction of a Google Play App
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: serviceAccount
inputs.label: Service Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: The VSTS Service Account that specifies the identiy you wish to publish your APK under.

inputs.name: serviceAccountKey
inputs.label: JSON Key Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON file provided by Google Play that includes the service account's identity you wish to publish your APK under.

inputs.name: packageName
inputs.label: Package Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique package identifier (ie com.google.etc) that you wish to update.

inputs.name: userFraction
inputs.label: Rollout Fraction
inputs.helpMarkDown: User fraction to update your rollout release to.
